_header: Listeneth now I shall you tell
_description: Syr Harrowde þe Gode Baron — in couplets

CULFf238.First Lines:
Lystenyth now y schall yow telleAs y fynde in parchement
                    spelle…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…And gyf vs grace þat hyt so beeAmen Amen for
                    charyte
CULFf238.Facsimiles:
McSparran,  Frances,  and  Pamela R. Robinson.  
             “Introduction.” 
             Cambridge University Library MS Ff.2.38.
         London: Scolar Press, 1979.
